documents.document:
BlackBerry 4G LTE PlayBook With 7 Inchs Touchscreen


The BlackBerry 4G LTE PlayBook is the extremely large PlayBook launched by BlackBerry with TFT capacitive touchscreen display of 7 inches with resolution of 600 x 1024 pixels. It runs on BlackBerry Tablet OS v2.0 powered by 1.5 GHz Dual-core processor. The device supports 2G, 3G and 4G network on which 3G supports HSDPA and 4G LTE network. It has good performances over multimedia as well social net work too. Read more

Motorola Electrify 2 XT881 4.3 inches Touchscreen Smartphone


The new version of Android Smartphone from Motorola known as Motorola Electrify 2 XT881 is incredibly slim and highly advanced handset. To specify a bit about the design, it comes with the dimension of 128.5 x 65.8 x 8.4 mm resulting the less weight of 130g. well, it features TFT touchscreen display of 4.3 inches with a resolution of 540 x 960 pixels. It runs on Android 4.0 operating system powered by 1.2 GHz Dual-core processor and includes 8 Megapixel pixel LED flash primary camera and VGA secondary camera both the camera has a optional features of Geo-tagging, face detection, image stabilization and full HD video recording up to1080p@30fps. Read more

Sony Xperia SL 12 MP Camera Android Smartphone


Sony Xperia SL is the company’s best Android Smartphone which is ever launched before for having truly a sense of advance technology. Though it’s not the first Android Smartphone launched by Sony but surely the first Android Smartphone having incredibly boost in hardware and software feature. The handset comes with extensively large LCD, capacitive touchscreen display of 4.3 inches with multitouch up to 10 fingers. It runs on Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) operating system and powered by 1.7 GHz Dual-core processor. Read more

Samsung Galaxy S Lightray 4G Android Smartphone


The Samsung Galaxy S Lightray 4G is the Samsung’s first MetroPCS smartphone with the built in antennas to take up Dyle Mobile TV service. The handset runs with Android 2.3 Gingerbread operating system and basically supports 4G LTE network. It comes with touchscreen 4.3 inches with super almond display and offers 8 megapixel rear facing snap shooter with LED flash and 1.3 Megapixel front-facing camera. Read more

Sony Xperia T 13 MP Camera Android Smartphone


Sony is going to launch a new model Android Smartphone known as name Sony Xperia T which is extremely beyond one’s imagination. Though it is not announced officially but with the leaked out information it can be well visualized that the handset will give a full satisfaction to the users both technically as well functionally. So it will be having 4.3 inches touchscreen display and Touch-sensitive controls up to 10 fingers. It will runs on Android 4.0.4 (Ice Cream Sandwich) operating system powered with 1.5 GHz Krait Dual-core processor and supports 2G GSM and 3G HSDPA network. Read more

Samsung Galaxy TAB 2 510 Specifications


The Samsung has brought in to the market with latest Galaxy TAB 2 510 having twice much in the increase of hardware and software features. It is basically equipped with 10.1 inch WXGA TFT touchscreen with a resolution of1280 x 800 pixels and 175.3 x 256.6 x 9.7mm of dimension resulting 583g of weight. Well, with the petty much design it evenly has an effective features too. It runs on Android 4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich operating system and powered with 1 GHz Dual core processor. Read more

Samsung Array M390 CDMA Smartphone


The Samsung Array M390 not just makes you easy communication but also adds more entertainments values. It comes with 2.4 inches display and QWERTY keyboard with which you can view your videos with high beat audio player else type your message at a short Spain of time. You even have the option to view your multimedia programs on a large screen through built in USB connectivity. It can store data up to 40 MB and extends microSD up to 32 GB. It only offers 2 Mega pixel camera at the back side of the handset for photo shoots and video recordings. Read more

Apple iPhone 5 Review And Specifications

The Hottest news in phone world is about the Apple iPhone 5. It is come soon in the market by replacing iPhone 4s. It has more powerful features than the previous iPhone's. If you are planning to buy 4s then I suggest just wait for iphone 5 to come in the market and have it then. It’s because the smartphone will come with dual core processor which enables it to process the requests faster than ever. It will be incorporating more powerful graphics card which will give the best video and snaps. The new Apple iPhone 5 will be running on 4G LTE network instead of usual 3G network. Its display will be of 4-inches. Features 12 MP Snap shooter with Secondary camera, 3D maps, Updated Siri, Memory option 16/32/64 GB etc. Read more for Full Specifications

Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 N8000


Get the extreme comfort from Samsung Galaxy Note 10.1 N8000 with the support for GSM voice communication, SMS, and MMS. Samsung now came up with this very latest device having much improved in the features. It comes with PLS TFT capacitive touchscreen display of 10.1 inches, 5 Megapixel LED flash camera for stunning photo shots and HD video recordings up to 1080p@30fps, 1.9 Megapixel secondary camera, internal storage up to 16/32/64 GB (respectively), 2 GB RAM and extends microSD up to 64 GB. It runs on Android v4.0.3 Ice Cream Sandwich operating system powered with 1.4 GHz Quad-core processor. Read more

Sony Xperia Tablet Specifications


The Sony Xperia Tablet is the next flagship of Sony tablet which has been leaked and it will be the promising device having exceptionally promoted features. It will run on Android v4.0 Ice Cream Sandwich operating system powered with 1.3 GHz Cortex-A9 Quad-core processor. The screen displays of 9.4 inches with multi touch and 8 Mega pixel camera at the back side and 1 Mega pixel camera situated right at the middle side of the front edge. Read more

Samsung Galaxy S Blaze Q Android Smartphone


Samsung leaked out the information to present the next Galaxy Android Smartphone known as Samsung Galaxy S Blaze Q having exceptionally cool features. They still give a possibility to stick with the handset for those who are found of side sliding handset really in further more advance features. With the draw back from all those previous launched handset they have implemented exceptionally the best technology in Samsung Galaxy S Blaze Q which is soon going to get release by the mid of August, 2012. Read more

How Tablets Give A Better Web Experience Than Mobile Phones


When it comes to deciding whether you want a mobile phone or a tablet, the answer is likely to depend on what you are most often going to use your device for. If you are not sure exactly what a tablet is, essentially it is like a cross between a mobile phone and a laptop computer – a little bigger than the former, but still a great deal smaller and more convenient than the latter. Read more

Dell Inspiron 15 N5040 Laptop


The Dell Inspiron 15 (N5040) Laptop is the best economic device suitable for domestic and student use. It is designed with 15.6 inch HD Display with High Definition images up to720p on a LED powered screen featuring smooth viewing of programs. It operates on Windows 7 Home Premium 64-bit operating system and intel® Core™ i3-390M processor. Read more

Apple iPad 3 Wi-Fi Review


Apple newly realised their new edition Tablet iPad 3 Wi-Fi also known as Apple iPad Wi-Fi. It is not a GSM device so it does not support any GSM network worldwide. The tablet comes with 9.7 inch wide range Retina touchscreen type LED-backlit IPS TFT, 16m color multi touchscreen, delivering incredible resolution of 1536×2048 pixels. The tablet is protected with scratch-resistance glass. Read more

Fujifilm X10 12 MP Digital Camera Review


The Fujifilm X10 is the company best digital camera allotted with average sensors in a compact, zooming camera. It features drastically improvement in video quality, large optical viewfinder, excellent physical controls, fast capturing speed and 4 x zoom lens. The best quality in X10 is the 2.8 inches LCD display, 12 mega pixel Resolution and 28-112mm Telephoto Manual Zoom Lens which helps you to take a photo of a distance object clearly. Though you have the multiple options to get your camera of your choice but make sure to choose the right one for your stunning shoots. Read more

Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 I705 Review


The Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 I705 is the new upcoming tablet date latest by the end of August, 2012 exclusively supports CDMA, 4G LTE, voice/data communication, SMS, and MMS. The system operates on Android OS, v4.0.3 Ice Cream Sandwich integrated with 1.2 GHz Dual-core processor. Delivers super service with the built in features of 7.0 inches touchscreen display, 3.2 Megapixel camera, TV Out, Quickoffice HD editor/viewer, HD video of 720p@30fps, 8 GB storage, 1 GB RAM and extends microSD, up to 32 GB. Samsung Galaxy Tab 2 7.0 I705 Specifications

Sony BRAVIA KDL-65HX925 (165cm) HX925 Series Full HD 3D TV


The largest LED TV brought to you by Sony has enormous entertainment facilities with huge viewing of 3D movies up to 120 degree only on Sony Bravia KDL-65HX925 TV. The 65-inch Sony Bravia HX925 comes with Intelligent Peak LED technology, pattern-optimisation and X-Reality Pro Engine video processing for perfect picture quality. It is the outstanding smart TV for all forms of multimedia and social media having 3 Built-in Speakers for excellent sound features, 1920 x 1080 picture resolution and apart form that it also comes with built-in apps for Facebook, Twitter and Skype for communication purpose. Read More

Samsung Series 7 3D Gamer Notebook


Samsung is updating its Series 7 Gamer Yellow 3D Laptop featuring 17.3-inch display on bright Yellow edition with new hardware. Along with the attractive exterior cover it also inbuilt the unique features for smooth and quick working. It gives twice much bright display with zero distortion and AMD Radeon HD 7870M AMD graphics card to make the 3D game play flexible. Read more

LG Optimus G E973 13 MP Camera Android Smartphone


It was just leaked with the few information on release of new 13 MP Camera phone LG Optimus G E973 supporting 4G LTE and runs on Android 4.0.4 Ice Cream Sandwich operating system. It is also mentioned that the Smartphone will feature 1.5 GHz Krait Quad-core processor, 2 GB RAM, Adreno 320 CPU and Qualcomm chipset. Android Smartphone equipped with 4.7 inches IPS HD capacitive touchscreen display for smooth viewing and display of videos and images. Read full article

HTC Desire X Ice Cream Sandwich Android Smartphone


HTC Desire X is the next mid budget Android Smartphone by HTC. Handset runs Android 4.0.4 Ice Cream Sandwich with 1GHz dual-core processor CPU. It comes with large 4 inch LCD display with 5 MP autofocus camera. Handset has 4 GB internal memory with 768 MB RAM and Dropbox (25 GB storage) and also supports external microSD memory card up to 32 GB. Desire X also has powerful battery backup talk time up to 10 hours standby time 833 hours in 2G.

HTC Desire X spot features:

Android 4.0.4 Ice Cream Sandwich with HTC Sense 4.0 UI
4.0-inch Super LCD display
1GHz dual-core processor
Bluetooth 4.0
3.5mm audio jack, USB
4GB internal storage + microSD card support, 768MB RAM
5MP rear camera with LED flash, F/2.0 aperture and HTC ImageChip

Full Specifications

Sony Xperia J ST26i Ice Cream Sandwich Android Smartphone


Sony aims to bring up the latest Sony Xperia J ST26i having maximum features resembling the old handset. However, the handset runs on Android 4.0, Ice Cream Sandwich operating system and features 4-inch True HD LCD display, 1GHz Qualcomm processor, 5 megapixel rear camera, VGA front camera and supports 1,700mAh battery.

Sony Xperia J Features

9.2mm slim stylish design
Size: 124.3 x 61.2 x 9.2
Weight: 124 grams
Android 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich)
Processor: 1 GHz Qualcomm MSM7227A
Large 4.0” FWVGA Display (480 x 854 pixels)
3.5 mm audio jack
Wi-Fi® Hotspot functionality
4GB internal storage
MicroSD card slot (up to 32G
Social media updates with illumination
5MP AF camera
Front VGA chat camera
Talk time: Up to 5hrs 36mins
Standby time: Up to 607 hrs
Battery 1750mAh
Available in Black, Gold, White and Pink colors

Full Specifications

LG Optimus L9 Features 4.7 Inch Display


LG’s new L-Style smartphone Optimus L9 comes with 4.7-inch IPS touchscreen display based on Android 4.0 operating system. It features 1 GHz Dual-core processors, 1GB RAM, 4GB of internal storage and memory expands up to 32GB. The handset inbuilt 5 megapixel LED flash camera simultaneously with VGA front facing camera for video callings. It comes with possible connectivity features of Wi-Fi, micro USB 2.0 and Bluetooth 3.0 for enter transfer of multimedia data. Basically the LG Optimus L9 comes with the bonus feature of DLNA, QMemo, QTranslator function translating about 64 user languages and 44 foreign languages and My Style Keyboard function. The whole set of device runs by the support of high-density 2,150mAh SiO+ battery. Full Specifications

Samsung ATIV S First Windows 8 Powered Smartphone


The latest handset with Windows 8 Operating system will be soon arrive in the market to be launch by Samsung known as Samsung ATIV S. At the mean time the handset equipped with appropriate size of 4.8-inch HD display with Gorilla Glass protection. It provides 8 megapixel rare camera with 1.9 megapixel front facing camera. The device features 1.5GHz dual-core processor, 1GB RAM and 16GB of internal storage memory. It can be further expand to store data on microSD, up to 32 GB. The handset packs with powerful 2,300mAh battery. View full Specifications

Apple Reveals Faster Thinner And Lighter iPhone 5

Apple announced the thinnest (7.6 mm) and lightest (112 grams) iphone 5 operates on iOS 6. Features 4 inches touch display, A6 chip, 4G LTE network support, upgraded Wi-Fi, panoramic 8-megapixel camera, improved speakers, greater battery life and a new dock and connector. Pricing starts at $199 for 16 GB, 32 GB for $299 and $399 for 64 GB respectively with 2 years contract. Pre-order starts from September14th. Shipping starts Sept. 21 in US, Canada, and several other countries.


iPhone 5 Features :

Fast 4G LTE data connection
20 percent lighter than 4S (112 grams)
18 percent thinner (7.6 mm)
Available on Verizon/Sprint/ATT
4-inch display 1136x640 pixel resolution
Processor and graphics are 2x faster (new A6 chip)
Battery: 8 hours talk time, 225 hours standby.
Camera: 8 megapixel, 3264x2448 resolution, f/2.4 aperture, panorama feature, 1080p HD video, front-facing Facetime camera updated (720p) and face detection, improved mics and speakers.
New smaller connector called Lightning. 8 pin, reversible (adaptor available for current connector).
